${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:BlackDragon.NAME: Black Dragon Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform into a #yBlack #yDragon, gaining #b10 Armor, and randomly grant #yExhausted and #yBrand to a card in your hand.

${modID}:WhiteDragon.NAME: White Dragon Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform into a #yWhite #yDragon, duplicating a card in your hand and granting #yBrand to it.

${modID}:Brand.NAME: Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: Randomly #yExhaust a card from the draw pile and play it at the end of the turn.
The following cards will be played at the end of the turn:

${modID}:AbyssFormPower.NAME: Abyssal Form
DESCRIPTIONS: The first use of a #yBrand card each turn triggers #yBe #yDragon.

${modID}:WhiteRealmPower.NAME: White Realm Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Each card #yExhausted by #yBrand triggers an additional time, lasting #b
turns.

${modID}:BrandProtectorPower.NAME: Brand Protector
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
Block for each card #yExhausted by #yBrand this turn.

${modID}:WhiteBrandPower.NAME: White Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you transform into #yWhite #yDragon, gain #b
#yStrength.

${modID}:BlackBrandPower.NAME: Black Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you transform into #yBlack #yDragon, gain #b
#yDexterity.

${modID}:NextCardFreePower.NAME: Phantom
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b
cards played will not consume [E].

${modID}:PhantomDragonPower.NAME: Phantom Dragon
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b
cards played after #yBe #yDragon cost #b0 [E].

${modID}:AshBrandPower.NAME: Ash Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, randomly add a copy of the #b
cards #yExhausted by #yBrand last turn to your hand with #yExhaust and #yEthereal.

${modID}:SurefirePower.NAME: Surefire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, add copies of cards #yExhausted this turn to your draw pile.

${modID}:HeavenlyRevelationPower.NAME: Heavenly Revelation
DESCRIPTIONS: On the second use of a #yBrand card each turn, randomly draw #b
cards with #yBrand in their name from your draw pile and randomly place #b
copies of Attack cards from the Exhaust pile into the draw pile.

${modID}:TrueEyePower.NAME: True Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b
cards played will cost #b1 less [E] .

${modID}:TrueDragon.NAME: True Dragon Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform into a True Dragon, gaining #b6 [E] , drawing #b6 cards, and reducing the cost of the next #b6 cards played by #b1 [E] .

${modID}:BarrierPower.NAME: Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: For each power gained this turn, deal damage equal to #b
times the number of power.

${modID}:SurefireScorchPower.NAME: Surefire Scorch
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time a card is #yExhausted by #yBrand, apply #b1 #yScorch.

${modID}:ScorchPower.NAME: Scorch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, take #b
damage. Halve the layers after each damage instance.

${modID}:AshPower.NAME: Ashes
DESCRIPTIONS: Take an additional #b
damage whenever take damage.

${modID}:WhiteDragonAwakeningPower.NAME: White Dragon Awakening
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform into #yWhite #yDragon at the start of the next turn.

${modID}:AshenManaPower.NAME: Ashen Mana
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, randomly select #b1 #yBrand card in your hand, reduce its [E] cost by #b1, and draw #b1 card after use.

${modID}:BlackDragonAwakeningPower.NAME: Black Dragon Awakening
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform into #yBlack #uDragon at the start of the next turn.

${modID}:DevouringBrandPower.NAME: Devouring Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the [E] cost of cards with the same name as those already in the Exhaust pile due to #yBrand by #b2.

${modID}:BrandsCallPower.NAME: Brand's Call
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the [E] cost of the next #b
#yBrand cards played by #b1.

${modID}:IceDevilsHeartPower.NAME: Ice Devil's Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the [E] cost of the next #b
#yAnti-Brand cards played by #b1.

${modID}:HeavenlyLinkPower.NAME: Heavenly Link
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards with #yHeavenly in their name reduce their [E] cost by #b1. Gain [E] each time a #yHeavenly card is played.

${modID}:IceDevilErosionPower.NAME: Ice Devil Erosion
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, increase the damage of #yAnti-Brand Attack cards in your hand by #b2 for this combat.

${modID}:IceDevilFormPower.NAME: Ice Devil Form
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAnti-Brand Attack cards also trigger their #yExhausted effects. #yAnti-Brand Skill cards gain [E] when played.

${modID}:AbyssalVengeanceDramaPower.NAME: Abyssal Vengeance Drama
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards that were #yBranded by #yDragon Transformation this battle gain [E] after being played.

${modID}:AbyssalBeastFormPower.NAME: Abyssal Beast Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Randomly increase the damage of all Attack cards by #b7 - #b14 each turn. Gain equal amounts of #yDexterity or #yStrength when gaining #yDexterity or #yStrength. Gain #b1 #yDexterity when transforming into #yBlack #yDragon and #b1 #yStrength when transforming into #yWhite #yDragon.

${modID}:AbyssAwakenPower.NAME: Abyssal Awakening
DESCRIPTIONS: Transform into #yAbyssal #yBeast #yForm at the start of the next turn.

${modID}:SurefireFormPower.NAME: Surefire Form
DESCRIPTIONS: When an #yAnti-Brand card is discarded or #yExhausted, draw #b1 card. If any enemy has a debuff, draw an additional #b2 cards. This effect triggers only once per turn.

${modID}:SurefireEntwiningPower.NAME: Surefire Entwining
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time an #yAnti-Brand card is played this turn, randomly grant #yAnti-Brand to another card in your hand without #yAnti-Brand.

${modID}:GoetiaBrandPower.NAME: Goetia Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time after #yBe #yDragon, add #b1 random #yGoetia to your draw pile. Each type of #yGoetia can only be gained #b1 time per battle.

${modID}:GamygynBrandPower.NAME: Gamygyn's Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: The fifth card you play every turn, if it's an Attack, will be Exhausted by #yBrand.

${modID}:OriasBrandPower.NAME: Orias's Virtue
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b
turns, ALL damage dealt is halved.

${modID}:OriasKnowledgePower.NAME: Orias's Knowledge
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b
turns, every time you play a Skill, Draw #b1 Power, and the drawn Power costs #b1 less [E].

${modID}:ShaxBrandPower.NAME: Shax's Brand
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time every turn you gain a power, choose #b1 card from your discard pile and add it to your hand. NL The first time every turn an enemy gains a power, choose #b1 card from your draw pile and add it to your hand.
